description: Shake up your lasagna with the Mexican flavours of spiced turkey and black bean chilli.
name: Turkey & Black Bean Mexican Lasagna Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180Â°C. Heat the oil in a large pan and cook the onion and turkey mince for 5 minutes. Add the garlic and spice mix and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir in the black beans and chopped tomatoes, bring to the boil, reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes until reduced.
Spoon a quarter of the mince mix into a large baking dish, top with lasagne sheets and repeat, finishing with a layer of sheets.
Mix the creme fraiche and mozzarella together in a bowl and dollop the mix on top of the lasagna. Spread out to form an even layer and bake for 25 minutes until golden and bubbling.
